text: 'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana
